00043 ActorParams *ActorParams::CreateFromStream(std::istrstream &in)
00044 {
00045         int actorType;
00046         in >> actorType;
00047 
00048         ActorParams *actor = NULL;
00049         switch (actorType)
00050         {
00051                 case AT_Sphere:
00052                         actor = GCC_NEW SphereParams;
00053                         break;
00054 
00055                 case AT_Teapot:
00056                         actor = GCC_NEW TeapotParams;
00057                         break;
00058                 
00059                 case AT_TestObject:
00060                         actor = GCC_NEW TestObjectParams;
00061                         break;
00062 
00063                 default:
00064                         assert(0 && _T("Unimplemented actor type in stream"));
00065                         return 0;
00066         }
00067 
00068         if (! actor->VInit(in))
00069         {
00070                 // something went wrong with the serialization...
00071                 assert(0 && _T("Error in Actor stream initialization"));
00072                 SAFE_DELETE(actor);
00073         }
00074 
00075         return actor;
00076 
00077 }
